Credits
Artwork By [Sleeve Design & Illustration] - Bill Smith 
Bass, Vocals, Written-By - Michael Dempsey 
Drums, Written-By - Lol Tolhurst* 
Engineer - Mike Hedges

Producer - Chris Parry 
Vocals, Guitar, Written-By - Robert Smith 

Notes
Compilation of selected tracks from "Three Imaginary Boys" and assorted singles originally released on LP & cassette for the North American market in 1980. It has since been reissued many times in different formats and with slightly different track listings. Painted CD version. 

Recorded at Morgan Studios, London, England. 
Distributed by Metronome Musik GmbH in Germany and Polydor outside Germany. 

Use: DAEMON Tools
